description: Try our easy to follow Potato & Pea Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Potato & Pea Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 piece fresh root ginger, 5 cm piece, finely chopped
2-3 fresh hot green chillies, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan over a medium heat. Add the ginger, chillies, cumin seeds, and mustard seeds, and crumble in the curry leaves. Cook for a couple of minutes until the mustard seeds start to pop. Add the tomatoes, stir through, and cook for a few more minutes.
Add the potatoes and turmeric, and pour in the stock. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat slightly, cover, and simmer for about 15 minutes.
Tip in the peas, stir through, and cook for a further 5-10 minutes. Season well with salt and black pepper, and stir through the coriander. Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
